message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $125 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell it for $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $135.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a better offer for you. I am willing to pay $128 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell it for $128. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $132.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
